Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Categorically \Cat`e*gor"ic*al*ly\, adv. Absolutely; directly; expressly; positively; as, to affirm categorically. [1913 Webster]
categorically adv : in an unqualified manner; "he flatly denied the charges" [syn: {flatly}, {unconditionally}]
